title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond EHR: Leveraging AWS for Maximum Clinical and Operational Impact (IND213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越电子健康记录：利用AWS实现最大临床和运营影响 (IND213)
abstract: Successful EHR hosting on AWS has become standard practice, as evidenced by AWS' 2025 Best in KLAS rating for public cloud. This session features two innovative health systems demonstrating how they've moved beyond basic EHR implementation to create competitive advantages with AWS. Leaders will share strategies for moving past "lift-and-shift" to drive meaningful innovation by leveraging cloud-native solutions, extending EHR functionality, and developing unique patient and provider experiences. Through real-world examples, attendees will learn practical approaches to healthcare innovation, value creation frameworks, and implementation insights. Designed for technology leaders, digital strategists, and clinical innovation teams seeking to differentiate their organizations.
abstract_cn: 在AWS上成功托管EHR已成为标准实践，AWS在2025年KLAS公有云评级中获得最佳评级即为证明。本次会议将展示两个创新型医疗系统如何超越基本的EHR实施，利用AWS创造竞争优势。领导者将分享超越"直接迁移"的策略，通过利用云原生解决方案、扩展EHR功能以及开发独特的患者和医疗服务提供者体验来推动有意义的创新。通过实际案例，与会者将学习医疗创新的实用方法、价值创造框架和实施见解。本会议专为寻求使其组织脱颖而出的技术领导者、数字战略师和临床创新团队设计。
